cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Oversight and Reform on July 20, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4393, A bill to require the Director of the Court Services and Offender Supervision Agency for the District of Columbia and the Director of the Pretrial Services Agency for the District of Columbia to reside in the District of Columbia

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 120 (Friday, July 9, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. NORTON:
H.R. 4393.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
clause 18 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution.
[Page H3617]

latestAction.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

title: To require the Director of the Court Services and Offender Supervision Agency for the District of Columbia and the Director of the District of Columbia Pretrial Services Agency to reside in the District of Columbia.
